pressure blast.name: Pressure Blast
pressure blast.desc: Unleash a powerful pressure blast from the weight of your weapon.

punishment.name: Punishment
punishment.desc: Absorb damage then return fury upon your foes.

onslaught.name: Onslaught
onslaught.desc:
Reel back and swing your weapon, unleashing an onslaught of blows if it hits.
[*Guard breaks]
